comment.author: 67507070@N00
comment._content: Joe was the brother of Jimmy Governor (aka "Jimmy Blacksmith"). Jimmy and a friend murdered the members of the Mawbey family and then fled to the bush, where Jimmy met up with Joe. The brothers then murdered 4 more people before Jimmy was captured. Joe was shot 4 days later. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jimmy_Governor

comment.author: 30636405@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called geranium spirit, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: This is a very interesting story and well worth reading.  The Governors really went on a rampage with left nine people dead and then the three of them, quite  bloody trail of destruction all told.  Great Post, thank you for sharing!
